Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ClientTUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ClientTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ClientTUI extends Object implements View
class ClientTUI for the textual interface of the game

    • writeText

      public void writeText(String text)
      Method writeText is used to print a text on the console.
      Parameters:
      text - - text to be printed.

    • displayUpdatedModel

      public void displayUpdatedModel(ModelUpdate modelUpdate)
      Method displayUpdatedModel sets the updated game view with the new model and calls the method refreshBoard to print the updated game view. Only on the first time the method is called it will set the elements PGC and CGC inside class DrawTui for future use.
      Specified by:
      displayUpdatedModel in interface View
      Parameters:
      modelUpdate - - updated model.

    • refreshBoard

      public void refreshBoard()
      Method refreshBoard clears the console and prints the updated game view. Based on the boolean values showCommandsList, showOtherShelves, showCommonGoalCards and isChatOpen, it will remember if the user wants to see the commands list, the other players' shelves, the common goal cards and the chat. If the user has new messages in the chat when it is closed, it will print a message to notify him. When those booleans are set to true, the corresponding elements be printed every time the method refreshBoard is called. If they are set to false, they will not be printed.

    • turnPhase

      public void turnPhase()
      Method turnPhase is used to print the current turn phase. If it's the player's turn, it will guide him through the commands he can use. If it's not the player's turn, it will display a message saying whose turn it is.
      Specified by:
      turnPhase in interface View

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      Method clearConsole is used to clear the console, it works by checking the current operating system and then executing the specific command to clear the console.

    • chooseConnection

      public void chooseConnection()
      Method chooseConnection is used to ask the user to choose which connection type he wants to use. It will keep asking until the user types a valid input then it will set the connectionType variable.
      Specified by:
      chooseConnection in interface View

    • running

      public void running()
      Method running is used to keep the TUI running until the user disconnects or the game ends.

    • printCommands

      public void printCommands()
      Method printCommands is used to print all the commands available to the user.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • showBoardPlayer

      public void showBoardPlayer(PlayerView playerView, LivingRoomView livingRoomView)
      Method showBoardPlayer is used to print the board. It will print the living room, the shelf of the player and his personal goal card adjacent to the living room.
      Specified by:
      showBoardPlayer in interface View
      Parameters:
      playerView - - the player view.
      livingRoomView - - the living room view.

      Parameters:
      token1 - - the points still available for the common goal card 1.
      token2 - - the points still available for the common goal card 2.

    • askForTiles

    • serverSavedUsername

      public void serverSavedUsername(String name, boolean b, String token, boolean first)
      Method serverSavedUsername is used to save the username of the player. If the boolean b is true, the username is saved, otherwise the username is not saved. If the boolean first is true, it means that it's the first player to connect to the server and login successfully. He will be asked to choose the number of players.
      Specified by:
      serverSavedUsername in interface View
      Parameters:
      name - - the username chosen by the player.
      b - - true if the login is successful, false otherwise.
      token - - the token of the player.
      first - - true if it's the first player to connect to the server and login successfully, false otherwise.

    • setGameOn

      public void setGameOn(boolean gameOn)
      Method setGameOn is used to set the gameOn variable in the client controller and in the command parsing.
      Parameters:
      gameOn - - true if the game is on, false otherwise.
